title: SIGNS FOR OTHER SWITCHBOARDS
fullText:
Where the IES is directly connected to a distribution switchboard, signs shall be installed in prominent positions on the main switchboard and all intermediate distribution switchboards. These signs shall contain the text 'WARNING', 'MULTIPLE SUPPLIES' and 'ISOLATE INVERTER SUPPLY AT DISTRIBUTION SWITCHBOARD' and 'LOCATION' where 'LOCATION' refers to the physical location of the switchboard that the IES is directly connected to.

NOTE: An example is provided in Appendix A.
